Hermione Granger from Harry Potter: I would choose Hermione Granger because of her intelligence, resourcefulness, and bravery. She is always thinking ahead and coming up with creative solutions to problems. She also stands up for what she believes in and is not afraid to speak her mind.

Wonder Woman from DC Comics: I would choose Wonder Woman because of her strength, determination, and compassion. She is a powerful warrior who fights for justice and peace. She is also a leader and a mentor to others.

Frozen Elsa from Disney: I would choose Frozen Elsa because of her unique abilities and her journey of self-discovery. She is a powerful sorceress who learns to embrace her powers and overcome her fears. She is also a kind and compassionate person who cares for those around her.

Tony Stark from Marvel Comics: I would choose Tony Stark because of his intelligence, creativity, and charisma. He is a brilliant inventor who creates amazing technology. He is also a leader and a mentor to others.

Katniss Everdeen from The Hunger Games: I would choose Katniss Everdeen because of her strength, resilience, and determination. She is a survivor who fights for what she believes in. She is also a compassionate person who cares for those around her.
